name: 廖華彥
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟全民英檢中級的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。

Week 4: Introduction and Strategies to Listening Part 2; Vocabulary Review

Week 7: Complete Listening Practice Test

Week 9: Introduction and Strategies to Reading Part 1; Vocabulary Review
Week 10:Introduction and Strategies to Reading Part 2;Vocabulary Review
Week 11:Introduction and Strategies to Reading Part 3;Vocabulary Review
Week 12: Complete Reading Practice Test
Week 13: Complete Listening and Reading Test
Week 14: Discussion
Week 15: Complete Listening and Reading Test
Week 16: Discussion

Week 18: Day off
